class.name: LimboState
class.brief_description: A State node for Hierarchical State Machine (HSM).

method.name: add_event_handler
method.description: Register [code]p_method[/code] that will be called when [code]p_event[/code] happens. Method must belong to the state.

method.name: call_on_enter
method.description: A chained method that connects [signal entered] signal to a [code]p_method[/code] on a [p_object].

method.name: call_on_exit
method.description: A chained method that connects [signal exited] signal to a [code]p_method[/code] on a [p_object].

method.name: call_on_update
method.description: A chained method that connects [signal updated] signal to a [code]p_method[/code] on a [p_object].

method.name: clear_guard_func
method.description: Removes the guard function that was set by [method set_guard_func].

method.name: dispatch
method.description: Dispatches recursively a state machine event named [code]p_event[/code] with an optional argument [code]p_cargo[/code]. Returns [code]true[/code] if event was consumed. Events propagate from the leaf state to the root. Propagation stops as soon as some state consumes the event.

method.name: is_active
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if it is currently active, i.e. it is the active substate of the parent [LimboHSM].

method.name: named
method.description: A chained method that sets the name of this state.

method.name: set_guard_func
method.description: Sets the guard function. It is a function that will be called each time a transition to this state should happen. If that function returns [code]false[/code], that transition will not be allowed.

members.member: A commonly used event that signifies that the state has finished work.
An agent that is associated with the state. Assinged by initialization.
A key/value data store shared by states of the state machine this state belongs to.

signal.name: entered
signal.description: Emitted when the state is entered.

signal.name: exited
signal.description: Emitted when the state is exited.

signal.name: setup
signal.description: Emitted when the state is initialized.

signal.name: updated
signal.description: Emitted when the state is updated.
